column2: plot1 <- ggplot(dat2plot2, aes(x = con, y = modulation_evoked, fill = con_Freq_attended, col = con_Freq_attended)) +
geom_beeswarm(aes(color = con_Freq_attended, x = con, fill = con_Freq_attended,
labs(title=sprintf("separate for RDK * attended color * unattended color"),
labels=c("20 Hz attended","24 Hz attended","30 Hz attended"))+
labels=c("20 Hz attended","24 Hz attended","30 Hz attended"))
savefig <- multi_panel_figure(columns = 1, rows = 1, panel_label_type = "none", width = 8, height = 5, unit = "in")
